pages.text: Before I can make any jewelery I need to first create some malleable metal. I believe copper, iron, gold, and diamond can all be heated!
Now we create a mould that will be used to create our final product! I personally prefer rings but there is a variety of varying jewelery we can create.
When the fire is hot and the liquid metal, it's time to pour!
Now we take it to the anvil and remove any imperfections!
